alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 11:46AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau County... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is expecting to continue. * WHERE...Souris River near Westhope. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1414.0 feet, Water is almost valley-wide. The area flooded is grass covered and no buildings are affected. At 1416.0 feet, Wildlife and refuge flooding only. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 1414.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to 1414.5 feet tomorrow evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 1414.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1414.3 feet on 07/13/1954. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
